description: The Minister of Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) (also known as Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC)) on behalf of Employment and Social Development Canada has a requirement for services that involve monitoring electronic media and transcribing radio and television reports and programs that are "broadcast nationally or regionally in Canada on and as and when requested basis".
full_summary:
### Media Monitoring Services Tender

#### Tenders Title and References
* **English:** Request for Proposal (RFP) G9292-255573: Media Monitoring Services
* **French:** Demande de proposition (DP) G9292-255573: Services de surveillance des médias
* **Reference Number:** WS4499930713
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4499930713

#### Tender Details
* **Tender Closing Date:** April 9, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** May 1, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2025 (with two 1-year option periods)
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entity:** Department of Employment and Social Development (ESDC)

#### Tender Description
The proposed contractor is required to provide media monitoring services, including monitoring of electronic media and transcription of radio and television reports and programs that are broadcast nationally or regionally in Canada. The services will be provided on an “as and when requested basis”. 

#### Tender Evaluation Criteria
The tender will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

#### Procurement Method
This procurement will be conducted using a competitive, selective tendering process.

#### Trade Agreements
This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

#### Regions of Opportunity and Delivery
* **English:** Canada
* **French:** Canada

#### Contact Information
* **Contact Name:** Fitzsimmons, Ania
* **Contact Email:** ania.fitzsimmons@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Contact Phone:** Not Available

### Additional Information
Please note that amendments to this tender are available. The most recent amendment has changed the closing time. Please disregard the previous closing times mentioned on Ariba Discovery and in CanadaBuys. All bids must be submitted by the new closing time to be considered responsive.  Bids submitted after the new closing time may be non-responsive.
